3: Continuous explosions echoes from behind the Gray Raven squad.

Okay! Scanning the geographical distribution and recalculating new routes!
Yes, it's the only path around here.
Subway... normally a low viral density area... but the readings here are abnormally high.
That must be why the Iron Maiden was so difficult to trace. She must have hidden herself underground.
It's not safe around here. If we don't find an exit before it collapses...

Clean this area up and prepare for engagement!
